Capital Chamber Choir

Lux Aeterna

The Capital Chamber Choir presented their Spring programme, Lux Aeterna, Friday, April 8th, 2011. The concert was an evening of works of light and tears, featuring Morten Lauridsen’s magnificent opus Lux Aeterna. Read a writeup of the concert by Ottawa Citizen classical music writer Steve Mazey.
